title: Reporting a Player for Abuse in Client Chat (Screenshot)
body:
He was on my team and most of my team were annoyed at him that he kept diving in and that he fed top lane.
I didn't say anything to him and i got this unprovoked message after he added me then deleted me. :|

[http://s15.postimg.org/x9shydxgr/flamed.png](http://s15.postimg.org/x9shydxgr/flamed.png)

replies.body:
Why accept a friend request from someone who is clearly a toxic player? Report him and move on.

Additionally, you can't put details of another summoner here and tell us to ban him. Firstly, we can't, and secondly it's bannable in itself.

Take it to a support ticket, if you really want to.
